textWithTimes.text: I have no illusions that the road ahead of me will be easy either for the short term or the long haul.
I never imagined that I would find myself in this position.
But now that I am, I assure you that I will meet the challenge with both humility and courage.
Members of the United States Senate. I look forward to working with you during the confirmation process and I will do my very best to demonstrate that I am worthy of your support.
